profile:
I am a local service and garage door installer for the Barrie and surrounding area for 18 years. Customer satisfaction is a key factor for myself and my business. 

Please feel free to either email or phone  for any day to day concerns with your doors, or for any quotes towards new ones. 

We provide removal and disposal of existing garage doors, and provide a selection of newer styles in a variety of colours for your home. 

Also available are different styles of garage door openers. We offer maintenance on all doors and openers to prevent unnecessary problems for you during the changing seasons.

Roly's Garage Doors and Openers
Garage Doors and Garage Door Repair in Barrie and Orillia

profile: ADR Garage Door Repair is a family-owned business. What makes us different from our competition is our extreme attention to details. Our motto is simple: provide the highest level of customer service and affordable prices. This combination is a winning one if you are looking for quality garage door repair in Richmond Hill,  you found the right place.  We put our customers as a top priority, which means your satisfaction guarantee!. Are you ready to replace your existing home look and looking for new garage door installation, maybe time to use the latest technology of smart garage door opener? Regardless of what your needs, we can make them a reality. We offer a variety of services, from professional installation to spring repair, cable repair and more.

profile:
TORO Steel Buildings is a  supplier of pre engineered steel buildings – all uses, all sizes, all finishes. Consumers and contractors come to us because we develop fast, efficient and affordable metal building solutions.

From a basic backyard storage shed to a more complex commercial steel building project, we have the expertise to deliver your new building on-time and on budget. The engineering and service team at Toro Steel Buildings is committed to saving you time and money by providing you with the best-quality steel building – at the best possible price. We have spent decades establishing the service and value formula that we have today which promises our customers that every dollar and minute is well spent.

profile:
Since 2009, Canadoor Door Systems has been bringing professionalism to the garage door industry. To ensure we perform every job to the highest standard, whether you need a garage door repair or installation, our technicians undergo a rigorous training process until we’re confident they are ready to enter the field.

We provide service across Ontario, with showrooms in Barrie, Bolton, Sudbury and Thunder Bay, where you can meet our team and browse our selection of garage doors. Whether you’re a homeowner in need of a garage door repair, new installation or a business looking for preventative maintenance on your commercial properties, we can help.
name: Canadoor Door Systems Inc - Barrie
